architecture.backend: Supabase backend with Postgres, RLS, Storage, Edge Functions (Deno). No standalone Node backend except temporary scaffolding.
architecture.frontend: Vite + React + Tailwind + shadcn/ui with strict TypeScript.
architecture.integration_pattern: All external APIs via Edge Functions; cache-first; strict validation using Zod.
architecture.security: Strict RLS, least privilege, no bypasses, signed URLs only, no client-side secrets.
